1.content:
She began to expand. It was over a month since she expanded to defeat evil. Soon, She began to expand till she wanted to stop. But she didn't. Soon after 25 minutes, she became a large planet. After the hour she wanted, she became quadriple the size of Jupiter.

Soon she...
1.title: Mammoth Mutt mistake

11.content:
She began to expand past her recommendended ballooning. She soon became larger than 20 earths can comine. She want to shrink back down. Soon, after 4 hours, she was 500 times the earth. Soon her rocket snaps, so shes left stranded to continue to inflate.

What will she do?

(Ha, Doo.)
11.title: Continued to expand more quickly

choices: The Dog Stars hose feed Mammoth Mutt
The Dog Stars uses a hose to give Mammoth Mutt water
The Dog Stars don't reply and Mammoth Mutt keeps inflating rapidly
111.content:
Mammoth Mutt began to feel a tightness around the many rolls around her neck, then her collar
suddenly snapped off. "Oh, no!" Her voice deepened from how massive she was. Her body pulsated,
then out of nowhere surged with a rapid out of control inflation. The collar with the red heart on it
was her body size control device. Now that it was off, she had no control or limit to how enormus
she'd further inflate and expand up to. "Without my collar on, I have no control of my power and
I'll inflate without limits!"

A half hour more passed and she was already the round size of the sun. Even her face cheeks,
ears, legs, paws and tail had been massively inflated out. Her face cheeks was the round size
of the Earth, her ears was the round size of Mars, her legs stuck out from her sides and was
the size of Jupiter each, her paws were the size of Neptune each and her tail was the size of
Uranus in roundness but shaped like a blimp in length.

Faster and faster she rapidly expanded, inflating her body pulsating with each surging and
body inflating sound it made. But now she was begining to actually like it, now only desiring
and wanting to inflate more bigger than she ever did before. But this body expanding was
makign her very hungry, the only food around was in the Dog Star ship. The collar with the
red heart on it seemed to remain floating an inch away from her head and between her
bloating face cheeks. "Help! Help! Dog Stars! I need help! I'm hungry! I need food!" And she
knew that if she ate food now, it would replace the air inside her with rapidly inflating fat. To
her that would be beautiful sight to behold.
111.title: Continue to expand BIGGER and BIGGER

choices: Jello gelitan dessert or all flavors mixed
Fattening food paste like macaroni and cheese
1111.content:
What do the Dog Stars feed Mammoth Mutt?

1: A jello gelitan flavor dessert or all flavors mixed

2: A rapid weight gain formula

3: Some type of fattening food paste, like macaroni and cheese
1111.title: The Dog Stars hose feed Mammoth Mutt

choices: They insert hoses on several of Mammoth Mutt's body parts.
They take her to a place where Mammoth Mutt is guaranteed to inflate even more.
They rely on the universe's biggest inflatable thing ever mentioned.
1112.content: As the Dog Stars hear the deepening voice of Mammoth Mutt, they got out a hose that contains an infinite amount of water. The water hose is inserted into her mouth and as that happens the water flows into Mammoth Mutt's mouth as her body bloats out even bigger. Her body is now stretching to the size of 10 suns, and still growing. Now water fills the body of Mammoth Mutt as her body is still growing. The other Dog Stars are working on the handle. They turn the knob to increase the pressure of the hose. Mammoth Mutt can easliy handle the highest pressures in any hose of anything there is, especially when she is at normal size to begin with. "Glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug glug.." gulped Mammoth Mutt as she consumes millions of tons of water from the hose in making her body even bigger. Her body is now rounding out as it gets bigger still. The Dog Stars had just made an idea as Mammoth Mutt is is now the size and roundness of 100 suns.
1112.title: Inflating with a water hose

choices: The hoses stops working and Mammoth Mutt just inflates regularly.
Mammoth Mutt expanded even more rapidly
11122.content:
The Dog Stars took Mammoth Mutt to an alternative space where she can expand freely without worries about crushing populated planets in the universes. However, the way she was expand, it would be no surprise that she would outgrow it. So this was not a permanent solution.

Mammoth Mutt was still expanding from both her powers and the water she was filling herself up with. Already outgrowing a solar system, she continue to round up even more without a sign of stopping. Mammoth Mutt gulped down more of the water from the hose. Eventually she tripled her size and was close to filling up a whole universe.
11122.title: They take her to a place where Mammoth Mutt is ...

choices: To try and find her collar.
Try to reduce her size with a machine.
111222.content:
Mammoth Mutt's swelling still showed no signs of stopping. The hose still continued to fill her up with water and her expanding made it easier for her to have more room to hold it all. Already growing to twice the size of a single universe, Mammoth Mutt was most likely the biggest thing in all existence.

The Dogs Stars were worried that sooner or later she might outgrow.... everything. So they had to come up with something. They decided...
111222.title: Mammoth Mutt expanded even more rapidly

11123.content: The Dog Stars prepare of the biggest inflatable thing there is: an unpoppable expandable ball that represents the biggest star in the universe. Its complete deflated form is way bigger than the biggest star, and way more bigger than Mammoth Mutt right now. Heck, not even the universe would hold it (though it still expands). The Dog Stars give the deflated inflatable to Mammoth Mutt as they put it all into her mouth with no further damage. When all of the inflatable fits into the inside of Mammoth Mutt, the Dog Stars are gonna use that to stretch her already big and expanding body by filling it with...
11123.title: Inflatable Mutt

choices: Yells and Looks into a Window of the Dog Star HQ
1113.content:
She calls out more and more to the Dog Stars but they don't answer. She tries to grab her collar but she only exceeds to expand more. her voice gets deep enough for them to not recognize. She realizes that they are never going to come out and probably save her. She is now as big as 3 suns. She has two other choices.
She...
1113.title: The Dog Stars don't reply...

11131.content: Can mammoth mutt just open her mouth to suck up planets like a wormhole?

12.title: Expand slowly

122.content: Did turn evil before she ate the moon?
122.title: Eat

choices: Deflate back to her original size first.
Inflate big like their was no tomorrow.
Expand herself more with some machine.
Just relax and float in space for a bit.
13.content:
Mammoth Mutt stopped at the current size she was. This was actually the biggest she has ever been. She never really tested how big she really get. Most of the time, the biggest she got was as big as a house. So quadruple the size of Jupiter was a new personal best.

Mammoth Mutt thought now was the time to test her limit. So first, she decided to....
13.title: Stop expanding.

choices: Mammoth Mutt and Dog Daring travel back home to Planet Earth.
135.content:
As Mammoth Mutt was relaxing and floating in space while she was at it, somewhere over a little ways over from where Mammoth Mutt was relaxing and floating in space a giant fat animated anthropomorphic dog who also happened to be a superhero like Mammoth Mutt, in this case Dog Daring Guardian Of The Galaxy was on his way while he was traveling through the same area where Mammoth Mutt and the Dog Stars were at when he of course saw Mammoth Mutt and instantly fell in love with her as she herself instantly fell in love with her soon to be giant fat animated anthropomorphic dog handsome hunk of a superhero.

"Hi there you handsome giant fat handsome hunk of an animated anthropomorphic dog superhero." Mammoth Mutt said upon seeing Dog Daring himself.

"Hello there my little overstuffed pink Creampuff of a superhero." Dog Daring said upon seeing his own soon to be love interest.
135.title: Just relax and float in space for a bit.

info.brief_description: Mammoth Mutt has a BIG problem, her power malfunction
info.description: She was bored because there were no signs of evil for a month. She soon told them she'll be going outside into space for an hour. Soon when she went into space, she felt like to expand for a while.
